channel.title: Pk Isle X Will Come Out Check This!
channel.description:
Hello,
PkIsle X, is the newest project we've developed. The expected release is 8th July for public and 5th July for beta testers, applications for testing have closed already sorry, we've kept the site quiet for a few days before releasing information.
When you install the client, it's like swiftswitch you simply click the icon to play it. More information at http://www.pkislex.net Client Features:
-New Look -Help Section -Developer List -Notepad -Radio -Irc Chat -Forums -Highscores & Lot's More
This only the beta version of the client, you can read more about future updates on the site.
Pictures Of The Client :
HomePage:
[URL=http://img412.imageshack.us/my.php?image=homepagekj7.png][IMG]http://img412.imageshack.us/img412/3271/homepagekj7.th.png[/img][/URL]
Clicking "Play PkIsle X"
Clicking "Play PkIsle X"
[URL=http://img92.imageshack.us/my.php?image=clientsm3.png][IMG]http://img92.imageshack.us/img92/9615/clientsm3.th.png[/img][/URL]
Irc Chat: (Will be fixed within 20 minutes)
[URL=http://img405.imageshack.us/my.php?image=ircchatvp6.png][IMG]http://img405.imageshack.us/img405/4664/ircchatvp6.th.png[/img][/URL]
